response.overview: A young boy enters the Shaolin Temple and undergoes rigorous training in traditional martial arts. The film focuses on discipline, endurance, and classical Shaolin forms as the child monk learns the fundamentals of kung fu. This is a 1972 Taiwanese production by Hwa Shing Film Co. and is not related to the similarly titled 1984 Hong Kong film.
response.tagline: A young monk’s first steps on the Shaolin path.
response.title: 小和尚出馬

titles.title: The Little Hero of Shaolin Temple

release_dates.note: Original Taiwanese theatrical release. Not related to the 1984 Hong Kong film with the same English title.
